title: YouTube returns as the exclusive livestream partner for Coachella
content:
Since 2011, the best way to watch Coachella from the comfort of your own home has been via YouTube. The video streaming service has made a live feed of the world-renowned festival available for users to view at home on their mobile phones or on their desktops, and this year is no different. This is

The post YouTube returns as the exclusive livestream partner for Coachella appeared first on xda-developers.
description: YouTube has returned as the exclusive livestream partner for Coachella, offering a "front row" experience for both weekends of the festival.
